title: Welcome Preparation!
detail_text: <:th_ch0004/>Nijigaku’s Osaka live was truly wonderful, wasn’t it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Yeah. I could feel the passion even from the video.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Despite Nijigaku’s focus on individuals, the entire concert was brimming with the group’s identity.... They really have a peculiar charm.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>True to “rainbow” meaning in their name, it’s as if an arch of many different colors materialized for us.... Oh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>What’s wrong, Eli?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>I just got a message from Nijigaku. They asked if they could come to Otonokizaka right now.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Of course they could! I would love to hear about their live!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>They said they’re bringing souvenirs. Fufu, I wonder what it might be. I’m looking forward to it.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Souvenirs from Osaka.... Maybe I should have some tea ready then!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Souvenirs aren’t limited to food, though....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Ah.... Y-, you’re right. Osaka is a famous gourmet city, so I just assumed it would be food....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
